name: AskOurScientists
0:
”Alexa, ask our scientists why its called coronavirus?”
”Alexa, ask our scientists how antivirals work”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: our scientists
des:
This skill answers commonly asked scientific questions about the novel coronavirus (COVID-19). All the questions were submitted by users on covid19.fas.org and have been answered by scientists in the National Science Policy Network and several volunteers. This skill was developed by the Governance Lab in partnership with Federation of American Scientists and the New Jersey Office of Innovation.
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
